resources.string: Unfortunately we were unable to upload your data to the server. We are going to save your data locally and upload it at a later time.\\n\\nPlease also take a note yourself with old fashioned pen and paper, to make sure you definitely have this record saved!\\n\\nSorry for the inconvenience!\\n\\nNote; if this error occurs often, please notify the board of the Bedrijvendagen.

Unfortunately we were unable to upload your data to the server. We are going to save your data locally and upload it at a later time.\\n\\nPlease also take a note yourself with old fashioned pen and paper, to make sure you definitely have this record saved!\\n\\nSorry for the inconvenience!\\n\\nNote; if this error occurs often, please notify the board of the Bedrijvendagen.
